processing.text: declare @message nvarchar(4000), @notAuthorized nvarchar(512), @exists nvarchar(512), @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @invalid nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @irregularChars varchar(128), @r int, @childAccount$Conflict nvarchar(4000) declare @baseCurrency varchar(32), @m_tk_cn_list varchar(512), @d datetime select @m_tk_cn_list = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_tk_cn_list' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue;, @d = getdate() select @invalid = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có giá trị nhập không hợp lệ.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell has invalid value.' end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell lồng nhau với một tài khoản khác cùng cấp.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is nested with an existing one in the same level.' end select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @exists = case @@language when 'v' then N'Không thể cập nhập dữ liệu vì tài khoản đã được sử dụng.' else 'Cannot import chart of account that has been used.' end select @notAuthorized = case @@language when 'v' then N'Chưa có quyền thực hiện chức năng này hoặc truy cập bị từ chối. Liên hệ với người quản trị hệ thống nếu bạn có thể được truy cập vào chức năng này.' else N'You are not authorized or you do not have permission to execute this action. Contact the System administrator if you believe you should be able to execute this action.' end select @childAccount$Conflict = case @@language when 'v' then N'Các ký tự bắt đầu của tài khoản phải được khai báo trùng so với tài khoản mẹ.' else 'The ordinal number of each sub-account must be added to the right of the number of its parent account.' end if @debug_mode = '0' begin if (exists(select top 1 1 from ct00) or exists(select top 1 1 from ct70) or exists(select top 1 1 from ct90) or exists(select top 1 1 from cdtk where (abs(du_no_nt00) + abs(du_co_nt00) + abs(du_no00) + abs(du_co00) + abs(du_no_nt1) + abs(du_co_nt1) + abs(du_no1) + abs(du_co1)) > 0) or exists(select top 1 1 from cdvv) or exists(select top 1 1 from cdhd) or exists(select top 1 1 from cdku) or exists(select top 1 1 from cdnvbh)) begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTableCell; select 'E', 1, @exists set @$errorCount = @$errorCount - @@rowcount; set rowcount 0; &EndErrorMode; end else begin select @exists as message, '' as field end return end if @@admin = 0 begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'Account', 'Edit') = 0 begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTableCell; select 'E', 1, 'notAuthorized' set @$errorCount = @$errorCount - @@rowcount; set rowcount 0; &EndErrorMode; end else begin select @notAuthorized as message, '' as field end return end end end -- Update update @@table set ma_nt = case when ma_nt <> '' then ma_nt else @baseCurrency end -- Checking if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'tk', stt, @message from @@table where tk like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'tk', @r = min(stt) from @@table where tk like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end &Checking; -- Do not delete following line -- #OverwriteChecking -- Gather select top 0 tk, ten_tk, ten_tk2, ten_ngan, ten_ngan2, ma_nt, tk_me, tk_sc, tk_cn, loai_cl_no, loai_cl_co, loai_tk, bac_tk, cast(0 as int) as stt into #r from dmtk insert into #r select tk, ten_tk, ten_tk2, ten_ngan, ten_ngan2, ma_nt, tk_me, tk_sc, tk_cn, loai_cl_no, loai_cl_co, 1, 1, stt from @@table create index i on #r (tk) update #r set loai_tk = 0 from #r a where exists(select 1 from #r b where a.tk <> b.tk and a.tk = b.tk_me) select tk, tk_me, bac_tk, stt into #dmtk0 from #r where tk_me = '' select tk, tk_me, bac_tk, stt into #dmtk1 from #r where tk_me <> '' if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_tk_long_yn' and val = '1') begin if exists(select 1 from #dmtk1 where charindex(rtrim(tk_me), rtrim(tk)) <> 1) begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'tk', stt, @childAccount$Conflict from #dmtk1 where charindex(rtrim(tk_me), rtrim(tk)) <> 1 &w1;'tk'&w2;stt&w3;@childAccount$Conflict&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select top 1 @childAccount$Conflict as message, 'tk' as field, stt as record from #dmtk1 where charindex(rtrim(tk_me), rtrim(tk)) <> 1 return end end end declare @max int, @count int select @count = 0, @max = 32 while exists(select 1 from #dmtk1) and @count < @max begin insert into #dmtk0 select a.tk, a.tk_me, b.bac_tk + 1, a.stt from #dmtk1 a join #dmtk0 b on a.tk_me = b.tk if exists(select 1 from #dmtk1 where tk in (select tk from #dmtk0)) delete #dmtk1 where tk in (select tk from #dmtk0) else break select @count = @count + 1 end if exists(select 1 from #dmtk1) begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'tk_me', stt, 'invalidValueMessage' from #dmtk1 where 1=1 &w1;'tk_me'&w2;stt&w3;'invalidValueMessage'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select top 1 @invalid as message, 'tk_me' as field, stt as record from #dmtk1 return end end update #r set bac_tk = b.bac_tk from #r a join #dmtk0 b on a.tk = b.tk and a.tk_me = b.tk_me select @field = 'tk' if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from #r a with (index(i)), #r b with (index(i)) where a.tk <> b.tk and a.bac_tk = b.bac_tk and a.tk like rtrim(b.tk) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from #r a with (index(i)), #r b with (index(i)) where a.tk <> b.tk and a.bac_tk = b.bac_tk and a.tk like rtrim(b.tk) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end &EndErrorMode; if @debug_mode = '1' and @@admin = 1 begin select '' as message return end -- Insert insert into dmtklog select @d, * from dmtk delete dmtk &Inserting; delete cdtk select tk as ma_nx, ten_tk as ten_nx, ten_tk2 as ten_nx2, * into #dmnx from dmtk where loai_tk = 1 if exists(select 1 from #dmnx) begin select top 0 * into #dmnx0 from dmnx0 select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Ext$Insert('#dmnx0', '#dmnx', '#dmnx0', '#dmnx', null, null) exec sp_executesql @q delete dmnx0 insert into dmnx0 select * from #dmnx0 end
